## About **rite** is a Python Utility Package. ## Quick Start ### Installation ``` pip install rite ``` ``` pip install rite==0.0.0 ``` [PyPi](https://pypi.org/project/rite/) ## Usage ... ## Authors **rite** is an open-source project by [Scape Agency](https://www.scape.agency "Scape Agency website"). ## Scape Agency Scape Agency is a spatial innovation collective that dreams, discovers and designs the everyday of tomorrow. We blend design thinking with emerging technologies to create a brighter perspective for people and planet. Our products and services naturalise technology in liveable and sustainable â€“scapes that spark the imagination and inspire future generations. - website: [scape.agency](https://www.scape.agency "Scape Agency website") - github: [github.com/scape-agency](https://github.com/scape-agency "Scape Agency Github") ## License Except where otherwise noted, **rite** is licensed under the terms of the [MIT License](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT "MIT License"). ## Contributing We'd love for you to contribute and to make **rite** even better than it is today! Please refer to the [contribution guidelines](CONTRIBUTING.md) for information. ## Disclaimer **THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED AS IS WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING ANY IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, MERCHANTABILITY, OR NON-INFRINGEMENT.**
